( BB: I hope this works)

BrightBlade, Rage.

* BrightBlade had followed Gangon to the repair chambers and had recovered, 
she now emerged from the chamber and stretched.*

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

* Rage had growled at Gangon when Scourge had said that she could harm him, 
but then looked at him when he said that they should go inside.
Scourge had assured her that there was nothing to worry about and that the 
large metal object was his home and wasn't alive.
She looked up at the Predacon base and gulped, well if he lived in it then 
it couldn't be all that bad...could it?
Rage nodded at Scourge.*

" Will go."
